nodes.text: The full-spectrum optical enhancer was a model of enhanced optics suite armor enhancement produced by Atlas Corp and sold for  1750. The suite was available during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin. The system included a number of sensors installed into a user's helmet which increased awareness of their surrounding space.

The full spectrum optical enhancer was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The same information was also included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released the following year by Fantasy Flight Games.
